name: FlashCars 0.0.1
description:
FlashCars is a Math Racer game where you answer the flashcards as fast as possible. It is currently tracking leaderboards in 3 Game Types with more planned to be added in the future. You can race against the top scores in each category. 

There is no login or email required. There is no way to chat in game, so it should be completely kid friendly!

All time leaderboard is cumulative and is never erased. The leaderboards per game type reset Monthly.

Planned Features:

Buy different cars with the points you have been earning.

Making optional login / reserving a name

More Game Types

Most of the Art was NOT created by me.

If i missed your name in the credits please shoot me an email and ill put your name on here!

Credits:
